title: S4 Ep12: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 6 – It Doesn’t Look Good
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 6 – It Doesn’t Look Good
description:
October 17, 2019 / Rebecca hosts Rabia and Toby Ball to talk about the 8 month investigation that lead to the arrest of Greg Lance.
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
 
Today’s addendum has been sponsored by Perfect Snacks.
